content.raw:
Correct on the user camera update rate. The value of 70fps is an optimistic number that was meant to make sure we render fast enough to be smooth. It is not meant to be an absolute goal that the render system must reach. You probably don't reach 70Hz with `default` or `gazebo7` when rendering full screen on a large display.

I'm working on the test, thanks.
content.html:
Correct on the user camera update rate. The value of 70fps is an optimistic number that was meant to make sure we render fast enough to be smooth. It is not meant to be an absolute goal that the render system must reach. You probably don't reach 70Hz with default or gazebo7 when rendering full screen on a large display.

I'm working on the test, thanks.
